description: Snippets can be created by selecting one or more objects in InDesign and then dragging them to the desktop. They may also be exported by selecting File â†’ Export within InDesign.

INDS files were used by older versions of InDesign and have since been replaced by .IDMS files with the release of InDesign CS4. Even though Adobe replaced INDS files, you can still open them with InDesign.
